#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
# define N 100005
long long int total;
long long int value(long long int k)
{
	return(total-(k*(k-1))/2);
}
int main()
{
	long long int t,n,k,sum,mid,low,high;
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%lld%lld",&n,&k);
		total=(k*(k+1))/2;
		if(n>total)
		{
			cout<<"-1"<<endl;
			continue;
		}
		low=1;
		high=k;
		while(low<high)
		{
		   long long int mid=(low+high+1)/2;
		   long long sum=total-mid*(mid-1)/2;
		   if(sum>=n)
			low=mid;
		   else high=mid-1;
		}
                long long int ans=low-1;
		cout<<ans<<endl;
	}
return 0;
}
